page.title: 02ARTS ,CRAFTS AND ATTITUDES
page.content: The crafts undertaken in the town are oil and water colour painting,maccrame,flower arranging,pottery,leather work held under the umbrella of The Looe Society of Arts and Crafts,which is a thriving amature organisation.There is also a thriving theatrical club called The Looe Players. Commercially there is painting,glass engraving,leather work and woodcarving. The attitudes of half the adult population is involved in earning a living from the holiday trade,whilst the other half are against as it disrupts their way of life.They were most probably tourists or earnt their living from tourism before retiring.
